author: Tay Yong Kwang J:
casename: Public Prosecutor v Shanmugam s/o Murugesu
counsel: Ravneet Kaur and Lee Cheow Han (Deputy Public Prosecutors) for prosecution; N Ganesan (N Ganesan and Associates) and Rajah Retnam (Rajah Retnam and Co) for accused
tags-parsed: Criminal Law/Statutory offences/Misuse of Drugs Act/Whether accused able to disprove presumptions of possession and knowledge of nature of drug on balance of probabilities/Whether accused had imported one or six packs of cannabis/Misuse of Drugs Act (Cap 185, 2001 Rev Ed) s 18(1), s 18(1)(a), s 18(1)(b), s 18(2), s 21
